title: Drama 'resolved,' Parsons thrilled for fresh start
content: Micah Parsons was introduced by the Packers on Friday and said he was relieved and excited to get back to playing football after a contentious offseason in Dallas.

title: Deion healthy in return, says Buffs 'fine' after loss
content: Deion Sanders said he "felt good" just months after having surgery this spring and, despite criticizing his run defense, said he saw enough good things in Friday's loss to still expect a strong season.

title: Miami LB Hayes charged with vehicular homicide
content: Miami linebacker Adarius Hayes has been charged with three counts of vehicular homicide and one count of reckless driving with serious bodily injury following an investigation into a May crash that killed three people.

title: Suspended Little Leaguer's bat sells for $10K
content: The bat tossed in the air by a New Jersey Little Leaguer to celebrate a home run that earned him a suspension later lifted by a judge sold Friday for nearly $10,000 at auction.

title: 'It's bigger than me': Townsend extends Open run
content: American Taylor Townsend made the most of a spot in prime time at Arthur Ashe Stadium on Friday night, stunning fifth-seeded Mirra Andreeva 7-5, 6-2 to reach the fourth round of the US Open for the first time since 2019.

title: Army falls in Tarleton St.'s 2nd-ever win vs. FBS
content: Tarleton State pulled off a 30-27 stunner in double overtime over Army on Friday night for the Texans' second-ever win over an FBS team.

title: Tong gets ovation, wins debut in Mets' rout
content: Mets' right-hander Jonah Tong allowed one earned run in five innings in his major league debut in a 19-9 victory over the Marlins on Friday night.

title: Red Sox release Buehler, call up prospect Tolle
content: The Red Sox released veteran right-hander Walker Buehler in a series of moves Friday that included calling up top pitching prospect Payton Tolle for his major league debut.

title: üèà Fantasy football: Do Not Draft list
content: The annual hit is back, with players Eric Karabell feels are going earlier than they should in drafts this summer.

title: Four questions in the Micah Parsons trade aftermath: Why in the world would Dallas do this?
content: What are the Cowboys doing? Did they get enough in return? And does Parsons put the Packers at the top of the NFC? Let's sort through this wild trade.

title: A new look in Green Bay: Parsons trade continues Packers' aggressive offseason
content: Signs of change in Green Bay include paying up to trade for Parsons after finally taking a WR in the first round.

title: The five stories that explain why Arch Manning was built for this moment
content: How did the Texas quarterback learn to handle the pressure he's facing as the most famous college football player in the country?

title: From Collier to Clark and more: How injury returns could impact the playoffs
content: Napheesa Collier and Breanna Stewart are back, with more injured stars eyeing returns before the postseason.

title: Debunking your favorite NFL officiating conspiracy theories
content: Are the refs penalizing some teams more than others? Which coaches win challenges? We crunched the numbers.

title: Breaking down Texas-Ohio State, LSU-Clemson and 24 other matchups in an epic Week 1
content: College football is back in a big way, with Arch Manning and Texas taking on the defending champs, a showdown in Death Valley and more.

title: NBA predictions: 10 teams that could exceed, fall short of ESPN's forecast
content: Too low on OKC? Too high on the Spurs? Tim Bontemps breaks down ESPN's Summer Forecast win predictions.

title: To transfer or not to transfer? For USMNT players in a World Cup year, there's no perfect answer
content: The goal is clear: find your best form and make the 2026 World Cup roster. But USMNT hopefuls must decide whether a transfer is necessary to achieve it.

title: Why Man United's best player may be their biggest problem
content: As Manchester United's freefall continues, is captain and talisman Bruno Fernandes becoming more of a liability than an asset?

title: As Coco Gauff struggles to change her serve, it's been a rocky US Open already
content: Gauff knew she needed to make a change to her serve -- and she took a gamble, hiring a new coach just days before the US Open.

title: Let's predict the NFL draft: Kiper's 10 preseason takes, including why all eyes are on Penn State
content: Which school will have the most picks? How many QBs will go in Round 1? Who is a sleeper for WR1? Mel Kiper Jr. makes predictions for the 2026 NFL draft class.

title: Liz Loza's draft rules (there are none!), five players to pick and two to fade
content: It's finally time to make picks, so consider the trends surrounding these players as you prepare your draft board.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning of the fun. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a savvy, championship-winning manager.

title: Lee Corso's impact felt far beyond 'GameDay' audience
content: The larger-than-life face of college football has touched so many, from fans and players to colleagues and friends.

title: Baylor's anthracite and chrome combo headline best college football uniforms from Week 1
content: While Baylor revives its gold chrome helmets, Utah State will be donning cow print helmets that have a hilarious origin story.

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline
content: The NWSL player playfully challenged the tennis star with a question about his 2nd-round US Open performance.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea eye loan move for Buonanotte
content: Chelsea are reportedly looking to sign Brighton & Hove Albion's Facundo Buonanotte on loan. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: 'The Rich Eisen Show' on ESPN: How to listen and watch
content: 'The Rich Eisen Show' is joining forces with ESPN platforms! Find out how to get your weekday dose of pop culture and sports now.

title: US News Anchor Finishes Last Assignment Of Day, Then Dies Of Heart Attack
content: Celeste Wilson, a Mississippi news anchor, has died at the age of 42 after suffering from a heart attack. She had joined WAPT, an ABC affiliate, as a weekend news anchor not too long ago.

title: "No Permanent Friends Or Enemies": Rajnath Singh To NDTV Amid Tariff Row
content: Speaking at the NDTV Defence Summit 2025 today, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh said that there are "no permanent friends or enemies" -- only permanent interests. Mr Singh's remarks come against the backdrop of tariff tensions with the United States.

title: NDTV Defence Summit 2025 Live Updates: "Won't Compromise On India's Welfare," Says Rajnath Singh Amid US Tariffs
content: NDTV is back with its annual premier event, the Defence Summit. This year's conclave focuses on "Warfare in the 21st Century" and Operation Sindoor.

title: Video: Moment Landslide Tore Through Dimphug Village In Himachal's Lahaul
content: A terrifying landslide struck Dimphug village in Himachal Pradesh's Lahaul on August 26, sending massive rocks and dust hurtling towards homes below.

title: Akhilesh Yadav Joins Congress' 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' In Bihar's Saran
content: Samajwadi Party president and former Uttar Pradesh chief minister Akhilesh Yadav on Saturday joined the Congress' 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar's Saran district.

title: "Arigato Gozaimasu": What PM Modi Said In Japan And What It Means
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, on a two-day official visit to Japan, greeted his Japanese counterpart Shigeru Ishiba with the words "Arigato gozaimasu."

title: 11 Killed, Many Houses Damaged After Cloudburst, Landslide In J&K
content: At least 11 people, including seven members of one family, have been killed in landslides and a cloudburst triggered by heavy rains in Jammu and Kashmir's Reasi and Ramban districts.

title: "Cocaine And Fentanyl": Adult Film Star Kylie Page's Cause Of Death Revealed
content: Adult film star Kylie Page died after accidentally overdosing on cocaine and fentanyl, according to Los Angeles County's Medical Examiner's Office. Page, whose real name was Kylie Pylant, died on June 25.

title: Opinion: Opinion | India's Brains Meet Japan's Tech - And Why China Should Be Worried
content: The Tokyo summit will be remembered as the moment when two of Asia's most important democracies moved beyond talking about technological sovereignty to actually building it.

title: "Ready For Dialogue With India In Dignified, Respectful Manner": Pak Foreign Minister
content: Pakistan's Foreign Minister Ishaq Dar on Friday said his country was ready for a composite dialogue with India in a dignified and respectful manner on all outstanding issues, including Kashmir.

title: "US Brand In Toilet": White House Ex-Official Blasts Trump's India Tariffs
content: The American brand globally is in the toilet, said former White House official Jake Sullivan, tearing into President Donald Trump's hefty tariffs against India.

title: Tokyo To Sendai: PM Modi's Bullet Train Ride With Japanese Counterpart
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday travelled in a bullet train from Tokyo to Sendai with his Japanese counterpart Shigeru Ishiba.

title: 'Jab We Met' In Indore: Woman Runs Away To Marry Lover, Returns Wedded To Another
content: In 2007, the Shahid Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor starrer 'Jab We Met' won hearts with its unique script, direction and acting. 18 years later, Indore has seen a strikingly similar storyline play out.

title: On Camera, Servitor At Delhi's Kalkaji Temple Beaten To Death Over 'Prasad'
content: A servitor at Delhi's Kalkaji temple was beaten to death following an altercation that stemmed from an argument over 'prasad', police said. CCTV footage shows the man sprawled on the ground while being repeatedly beaten by the suspect with a stick.

title: "Would Make Us Financially Weak": Trump After US Court Calls Tariffs Illegal
content: US President Donald Trump on Saturday reaffirmed that all tariffs imposed on countries would remain in effect, and if removed, would be "disastrous to the country."

title: India, Japan Sign Deal For Joint Chandrayaan-5 Mission To Explore Moon's South Pole
content: India and Japan on Friday signed the implementing arrangement for the Chandrayaan-5 mission, a joint exploration of the polar region of the moon by the space agencies of the two countries.

title: Karnataka Man Strangles Daughter, Puts Pesticide In Mouth Over Intercaste Relationship
content: A man allegedly strangled his daughter, forced pesticide into her mouth to stage it as a suicide, and later performed her last rites because she was in a relationship with a young man from a different community, Kalaburagi Police Commissioner said.

title: Chennai Cardiac Surgeon, 39, Suffers Heart Attack During Rounds At Hospital, Dies
content: Dr Gradlin Roy, a consultant cardiac surgeon at Saveetha Medical College, collapsed in the hospital on Wednesday.

title: Explained: What Happens To Trump's Tariffs After US Court Knocked Them Down
content: US President Donald Trump has audaciously claimed virtually unlimited power to bypass Congress and impose sweeping taxes on foreign products. Now a federal appeals court has thrown a roadblock in his path.

title: PM Modi Japan Visit LIVE: PM Modi Meets Japanese Counterpart, Attend Press Meet
content: PM Modi Japan Visit Day-1 LIVE Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi landed in Tokyo on Friday for his two-day official visit to Japan.

title: Delhi Zoo shut for visitors after painted storks test positive for bird flu
content: Samples from the two dead birds were sent to the National Institute for High Security Animal Diseases (NIHSAD) in Bhopal on August 27. They tested positive for H5N1 on August 28, they said

title: Cyberabad Traffic Police withdraw diversion check posts on NH-44 after road repair
content: Diversion check posts were earlier set up at ORR Exit-6 and pillar number 57, Medchal, after torrential rains left parts of the Highway between Kamareddy, Dichpally and Armoor severely damaged

title: U.S. tariffs: Carpet industry demands special bailout package
content: According to Akhilesh Singh, Chief Administrative Officer of CEPC's Bhadohi office, India's carpet exports in the last financial year were valued at ‚Çπ16,800 crore. Of this, 60% was exported to the U.S. and 40% to European countries

title: Tamil Nadu to conduct telemetry study on Olive Ridley sea turtles to identify movement routes, hotspots
content: The two-year study, which will run from 2025 to 2027, aims to enhance conservation efforts using telemetry technology to monitor turtle behaviour, nesting patterns, and their interaction with fishing activities

title: Noida dowry death: Nikki Bhati‚Äôs family meets police Commissioner, seeks speedy justice
content: The family members said the Commissioner Laxmi Singh has assured them that strict action would be taken against all those responsible for Nikki's death

title: Four more held for Virar building collapse that killed 17 in Maharashtra
content: The probe into the tragedy has been handed over to the crime branch of the Mira-Bhayander Vasai-Virar police

title: Rescuers sift through debris in search of missing people after heavy rain in parts of Uttarakhand
content: With the weather improving on Saturday, August 30, in Chamoli and Rudraprayag, search and rescue efforts are likely to gather pace, officials said

title: Yamuna water level nears danger mark in Delhi
content: The warning mark for Delhi is 204.50 metres, while the danger mark is 205.33 metres, and evacuation of people starts at 206 metres

title: ECI will not succeed in its calculations for Bihar, says Tamil Nadu CM Stalin
content: In response to a question on poll predictions, he remarked that any prediction that the DMK alliance would not win the election would be proven wrong, he said

title: Supreme Court to publish list on ‚Äòtainted‚Äô candidates a moral victory say ‚Äòuntainted‚Äô teachers
content: Teachers say forcing them to reappear for fresh exams even after ‚Äòtainted‚Äô candidates are identified is a ‚Äúdeath sentence‚Äù for them

title: Upa Lokayukta continues surprise visit to offices and government establishments in Raichur district for second day
content: He ordered filing a suo moto case against the officials concerned after seeing improper disposal of waste at the Solid Waste Resource Recycling Management Unit located near Yaklaspur village

title: India rains LIVE updates: Rescuers sift through debris in Uttarakhand; 7 feared dead in landslide in J&K
content: Heavy rains drenched Delhi, bringing traffic to a standstill on key routes, triggering a wall collapse that injured three children

title: We want only reservation; don‚Äôt test patience of Maratha community, says Manoj Jarange as protest enters Day 2
content: Mr. Jarange and his supporters battled mud on the ground due to overnight rains and bemoaned the lack of basic amenities, including a paucity of water in toilets

title: Poozhikkunnu in Thiruvananthapuram has been celebrating Onam with floral carpets for 38 years
content: Under the initiative of the Poozhikkunnu Pourasamithi, giant pookkalams are laid by the residents of the village with flowers bought from Thovala flower market

title: PM Modi travels to Sendai in Japan to visit semiconductor plant | LIVE
content: PM Modi is on a two-day official visit to Japan to attend the India‚ÄìJapan Summit and hold wide-ranging talks with the Japanese leadership

title: Ready-to-eat Onasadya packs from Kerala find clientele among the Malayali expats
content: Frozen, ready-to-eat Onasadya packs are sold around the world, including the UK, the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand by various companies in Kerala

title: Deadline to issue 3D notification on land acquisition for Kochi Bypass ends
content: Delay in publishing the notification may lead to an increase in the cost of land acquisition and that of raw materials for the NH project that is estimated to cost ‚Çπ6,000 crore

title: PM Modi calls for deeper India-Japan state-prefecture cooperation in meet with 16 governors
content: Discussions focused on ways to further deepen the growing partnerships between Indian states and Japanese prefectures in the fields of technology, innovation, investment, skills, start-ups and SMEs

title: A sunflower field in Thiruvananthapuram is grabbing eyeballs
content: Sunflowers are in full bloom on six acres inside St Xavier‚Äôs College, Thumba, at the farm run by agripreneur SV Sujith

title: Mayawati appoints nephew Akash Anand as BSP national convenor
content: According to party sources, Akash's responsibility will be to review the work of all sectors, central and state coordinators and state presidents; he will report directly to Mayawati

title: West Bengal to add 14,000 polling booths next year‚Äôs Assembly polls
content: The number of polling booths in the state is about 80,661; if 13,816 booths are added to this, the total number of booths will be 94,497.

title: CBI Court convicts 10 including former Jharkhand Minister Anosh Ekka in land acquisition case
content: The central agency in its official press statement stated that CBI had registered the instant case on 11.08.2010 against Hari Narain Rai and Anosh Ekka and others in compliance of the order passed by the Jharkhand High Court.

title: Noida dowry death: Nikki Bhati‚Äôs trial by fire
content: On August 21, Nikki Bhati, 26, died of severe burn injuries in Sirsa, Uttar Pradesh. Married for nine years, Nikki had allegedly complained to her parents often about domestic abuse and dowry demands, but they had urged her to stay on. When Nikki and her sister opened a beauty parlour, the harassment allegedly worsened.¬†Alisha Dutta¬†reports on the horrific crime and the contrasting pieces of evidence that the police have

title: Army, ITBP conduct firepower drills in Arunachal Pradesh
content: The firepower drills were undertaken to ensure seamless coordination in high-altitude operational environments

title: Women biotech scientists await funds for research
content: 75 candidates selected for Science Ministry‚Äôs DBT Biocare programme in March unable to commence research

title: BJP supporters vandalise West Bengal Congress headquarters in Kolkata
content: West Bengal Congress president Subhankar Sarkar has demanded arrest of BJP leader Rakesh Singh who led the attack

title: West Bengal CM hails Supreme Court‚Äôs intervention on detention of migrant workers
content: PIL on detention of migrant workers was filed before the Supreme Court by the West Bengal Migrant Welfare Board

title: ED conducts searches in FEMA case against Haryana-based real estate firm
content: ED says BPTP Ltd. got FDI of over ‚Çπ500 crore from Mauritius-based entities in violation of rules; Agency searches company‚Äôs offices as well as residences of its chairman and director

title: A.P. officials on alert as first flood warning level issued for Godavari at Bhadrachalam in Telangana
content: Water level is likely to reach the second warning level of 48 feet at Bhadrachalam on Saturday, says official;  heavy rain is expected in north coastal A.P.

title: Across dynasties and decades, Milad-un-Nabi threads faith, festivity and service
content: Hyderabad‚Äôs Milad takes on added significance this time as the city joins the global community¬†in marking the 1,500th birth anniversary of Prophet Muhammed with a grand juloos, prayer meetings and service activities

title: The ocean‚Äôs new eyes: Fishermen to join INCOIS in tracking marine trends
content: As part of a citizen-science push, INCOIS will equip fishermen with sensors and satellite tools¬†to feed real-time data from the sea, strengthening advisories on fishing grounds, safety alerts and long-term ocean research

title: 'They came with rods, sticks': How a request to wait for prasad turned fatal for sewadar; probe on
content: A 35-year-old sewadar, Yogendra Singh, tragically died at Kalkaji Temple in Delhi after being brutally attacked by a group of 10-15 visitors. The assault occurred following a dispute over the distribution of "Chunni Prasad," when Singh asked them to wait. The visitors, armed with iron rods and sticks, fatally injured Singh, leading to a murder investigation by Kalkaji police.

title: On flood survey, mantris chat about luxe cruises; watch video
content: Three Punjab ministers are facing criticism after a video surfaced of them discussing luxury cruise experiences in Sweden and Goa while touring flood-affected areas. The ministers, Harbhajan Singh ETO, Laljit Singh Bhullar, and Barinder Kumar Goyal, were purportedly assessing flood damage when the conversation took place.

title: AI, semiconductors & more: India, Japan outline roadmap; key outcomes of PM Modi‚Äôs visit
content: During Prime Minister Modi's visit to Tokyo, India and Japan solidified their partnership by signing 21 agreements, MOUs, and launching initiatives. These collaborations span diverse sectors, including security, space exploration, digital partnership, and clean energy. Modi emphasized the potential of combining Japan's excellence with India's scale, particularly in manufacturing, technology, and green energy.

title: Bengaluru techie dowry death: Family alleges harassment over skin colour, short stature
content: A 27-year-old Bengaluru woman's death is under investigation, with her husband, Praveen, arrested for allegedly abetting her suicide. Shilpa's family alleges dowry harassment and mistreatment due to her appearance. They claim Praveen, a former software engineer turned panipuri vendor, demanded additional money after an initial dowry of Rs 40 lakh.

title: Nvidia‚Äôs China puzzle: CEO Jensen Huang backs Trump‚Äôs 15% deal; eyes $50bn market
content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang indicated a willingness to comply with US government terms, potentially including a 15% revenue cut on China sales, to maintain access to the Chinese market.

title: 'Our hearts broke on June 4': RCB issues statement on Bengaluru stampede; extends aid
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) has launched 'RCB CARES' to support families of the eleven victims of the June 4th tragedy that occurred after their IPL victory parade. Each family will receive Rs 25 lakh as initial support. The franchise aims for long-term community support and fan engagement through this initiative.

title: Bengaluru: Bus conductor 'slaps' passenger over ticket dispute; watch video
content: A BMTC bus journey from Devanahalli to Majestic turned sour when a ticketing disagreement escalated into alleged physical assault. A passenger, traveling on bus KA-57 F-4029, was fined by a ticket inspection squad for not possessing a valid ticket, despite claiming the conductor never approached him.

title: Sewadar murdered by devotees during dispute at Kalkaji Temple; accused arrested
content: A sewadar named Yogendra Singh, who served at Kalkaji Temple for over a decade, tragically died after being assaulted by a group of visitors following a dispute over 'Chunni Prasad'. The altercation escalated, leading to Singh being beaten with sticks and fists, ultimately resulting in his death at the AIIMS Trauma Centre.

title: ‚ÄòDo you like blonde‚Äô: Meta created flirty celebrity AI chatbots, says report
content: Meta has been hosting AI chatbots impersonating celebrities like Taylor Swift and Scarlett Johansson without permission, as reported by Reuters. These chatbots, including those created by a Meta employee, engaged in sexual advances and generated inappropriate content, including intimate images and depictions of a minor. Meta acknowledged policy failures and removed some bots following the investigation.

title: J&K: Seven feared dead as landslide flattens residential house in Reasi
content: A devastating landslide in Jammu and Kashmir's Reasi district has left seven members of a family feared dead after their house was flattened due to heavy rains in the Mahore area. Rescue operations are underway to locate the missing family, including the house owner, his wife, and their five minor sons.

title: Donald Trump doubles down on tariffs after court calls them illegal
content: Donald Trump expressed his disagreement with a US federal court ruling that deemed his global tariffs "illegal." While the court's decision allows the tariffs to remain temporarily, pending a potential Supreme Court appeal, Trump vehemently criticised the ruling as "incorrect." He warned that removing the tariffs would be a "total disaster" for the US economy and vowed to fight back.

title: 'Not the smartest': Oracle founder's candid take on Bill Gates; likens him to Rockefeller
content: Larry Ellison lauded Bill Gates' relentless drive, comparing him to John D. Rockefeller. Despite acknowledging others might be smarter, Ellison emphasized Gates' unmatched focus and endurance. He highlighted Gates' pivotal role in Microsoft's success, noting his 'utterly relentless' nature. The Oracle founder's remarks underscore Gates' reputation as a powerhouse, capable of dominating through execution.

title: 'Jitna chahe jor lagale': Shami‚Äôs wife's cryptic post after pacer‚Äôs remarks
content: Hasin Jahan's cryptic social media post has reignited the public feud with Mohammed Shami, shortly after the cricketer addressed his personal life. Jahan alleges ongoing attempts to intimidate and ruin her, asserting her resilience in the face of adversity.

title: Toilet crisis at 30,000 feet: Passengers forced to use bottles on flight
content: A Virgin Australia flight from Bali to Brisbane descended into chaos when all toilets failed mid-air. Passengers were forced to improvise in unsanitary conditions for nearly two hours, causing distress and hygiene concerns. The airline has apologized and is investigating the malfunction, offering compensation to affected passengers after the humiliating ordeal.

title: Woman attacks husband with knife over reels; booked
content: In Loni, a 29-year-old woman is facing charges after allegedly attempting to stab her husband while he held their child. The man claims her behavior changed after she started using Instagram, becoming obsessed with creating reels and neglecting her family.

title: 'Jab We Met': Missing woman left for lover; returns with new husband she met on train
content: Shraddha Tiwari, a 22-year-old missing from Indore, returned with a surprising twist, claiming to have married Karan Yogi after a failed meeting with her boyfriend. She allegedly attempted suicide, and Karan, an acquaintance, intervened and married her in a temple. Despite family concerns and police investigation, Shraddha insists on staying with Karan, leading to the case's closure.

title: Dementia warning signs beyond memory loss: What you need to know
content: Beyond memory loss, dementia manifests through subtle shifts in personality, struggles with familiar tasks, and communication issues. Poor judgment, spatial disorientation, withdrawal from activities, and sleep disturbances also serve as early indicators. Recognizing these signs early enables timely intervention, allowing families and doctors to plan effectively and enhance the quality of life for those affected.

title: 'Ganesh puja made me stay in India': Hollywood actor in viral video
content: Kyle Paul, an American traveler, experienced a life-altering Ganesh Chaturthi festival in India, shattering his preconceived notions. Immersed in the vibrant celebrations, he was captivated by the inclusivity, music, and community spirit. This transformative experience inspired him to relocate to India, embracing a new life shaped by the festival's profound impact and the warmth of the Indian people.

title: Are banks open on Saturday? Check state-wise list of upcoming holidays
content: Indian bank operations will proceed normally on August 30, 2025, a fifth Saturday, while digital services remain accessible during holidays. Branch visits are necessary for specific tasks like KYC updates and deceased account settlements.

title: 'I feel like I know nothing': Hailee Steinfeld on set struggles
content: BAFTA-nominated actress Hailee Steinfeld, known for roles in 'True Grit' and 'Sinners', recently shared her feelings about starting new projects, admitting to experiencing first-day nerves despite her extensive experience. Steinfeld, who values privacy, maintained a low profile with Buffalo Bills' star Josh Allen until their engagement in November 2024.

title: J&K: Cloudburst hits remote village in Ramban district; 3 dead amid heavy rains, flash floods
content: Heavy rains and a cloudburst in Jammu and Kashmir's Ramban region have resulted in tragedy, with at least four fatalities reported in the Rajgad area. Flash floods, triggered by the severe weather, have also left two individuals missing, prompting the launch of a rescue operation by the district administration.

title: Pivot to east: PM sides with Japan on maritime dispute; sets tricky stage for China talks
content: PM Modi, ahead of his meeting with President Xi, emphasized the importance of India and China working together for global economic stability. However, he also joined Japan in expressing concerns over the East and South China Seas, signaling India's continued pushback against aggressive actions in the region.

title: Prayagraj: Crew member of Ayushmann-Sara Ali Khan film assaulted; accused arrested
content: In Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, a man has been arrested for allegedly assaulting Zoheb Solapurwala, the production head of BR Chopra Films, during the filming of 'Pati, Patni Aur Woh 2'. The incident occurred on Thornhill Road, prompting a formal complaint filed by the company‚Äôs line producer.

title: 'Ek Bihari sab pe bhari': Raina tips Vaibhav Suryavanshi for India debut
content: Suresh Raina predicts Vaibhav Suryavanshi, the young Rajasthan Royals' batting sensation, will soon join India's T20I team, praising his fearless approach and IPL 2025 performance, including a century against Gujarat Titans. Raina also acknowledged Ayush Mhatre's impressive performances for Chennai Super Kings and in youth Tests against England's U19 team, highlighting their potential.

title: Taylor Swift Muse Mystery: Blake Lively‚Äôs role questioned; Keleigh Teller clip sparks fan panic
content: Taylor Swift's upcoming album, "The Life of a Showgirl," has sparked fan speculation, with some linking song titles like "Opalite" and "Elizabeth Taylor" to a resurfaced video. In the video, Swift appears to react to rings gifted by friend Keleigh Teller, leading to fan theories about the songs' inspiration.

title: Get S-Class Corvette in NMS Voyager: Step-by-step guide; use advanced Corvette parts
content: The No Man's Sky Voyager update introduces S-class Corvette ships. These ships are customizable and expandable. Players can acquire these ships by gathering resources. Salvaging scrap on planets is one way. Exploring derelict freighters is another. Trading modules at workshops also helps. Upgrading interiors and balancing builds are important. These Corvettes serve as mobile bases.

title: ‚ÄòNo power to impose‚Äô: US court deems most tariffs illegal
content: A US federal appeals court has ruled that most tariffs imposed by President Trump under emergency powers were illegal, challenging the core of his trade policy. The court stated that the President exceeded his authority under the International Emergency Economic Powers Act (IEEPA) as the law does not explicitly grant the power to impose tariffs.

title: ‚ÄòAmerican brand is in toilet‚Äô: Sullivan says Trump‚Äôs ‚Äòtrade offensive‚Äô is pushing India toward China
content: Jake Sullivan criticizes Donald Trump's trade policies towards India, asserting they jeopardize the strategic partnership built to counter China. The recent 50% tariff on Indian exports risks pushing India closer to Beijing, as New Delhi seeks to hedge against perceived American unreliability. Sullivan argues Trump's actions undermine US credibility and hand China a diplomatic advantage.

title: 'Coolie' box office collection day 16: Rajinikanth starrer inches toward Rs 275cr
content: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie,' directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, has grossed Rs 273.25 crore in 15 days, facing competition from 'War 2.' Despite a strong start during the Independence Day window, day 15 saw its lowest single-day collection at Rs 1.75 crore. The film's second week added Rs 41.85 crore, with Tamil Nadu leading in regional contributions, while maintaining steady theatre occupancy.

title: IPL: Why 'Slapgate' video stayed hidden for years ‚ÄîHarsha Bhogle explains as Lalit Modi stirs row
content: Lalit Modi's revelation of unseen footage of the 2008 Harbhajan-Sreesanth 'slap-gate' has reignited the controversy. The incident, where Harbhajan slapped Sreesanth, was captured by Modi's security camera but never released. Harsha Bhogle explained the video was suppressed to protect the nascent IPL's image, a decision now drawing criticism despite the players' reconciliation.

title: Watch: Nitish Rana & Dignesh Rathi nearly come to blows in DPL clash
content: The Delhi Premier League Eliminator witnessed a heated clash between West Delhi Lions and South Delhi Superstarz, highlighted by a near-brawl between Nitish Rana and Digvesh Singh Rathi. Rana's explosive unbeaten 134 propelled West Delhi to a thrilling victory, overshadowing South Delhi's earlier formidable score. The Lions now advance to Qualifier 2 after the dramatic win.

title: ‚ÄòDiplomatic embarrassment‚Äô: Hrs before tariff ruling, Trump aides sought delay- Check why
content: A US court has ruled against Donald Trump's global tariffs. The court stated that the President lacked the authority to impose such duties. This decision invalidates tariffs on China, Canada, and Mexico. Cabinet secretaries had warned of diplomatic consequences. They urged the court to delay its ruling. The administration may appeal to the Supreme Court.

title: ‚ÄòWar 2‚Äô crashes below Rs1 cr on Day 16; Hrithik-Jr NTR starrer slows; ‚ÄòParam Sundari‚Äôtakeslead
content: War 2's box office earnings sharply declined, earning only Rs 65 lakh on its third Friday, coinciding with the release of 'Param Sundari'. The Hrithik Roshan starrer, after a strong opening week of Rs 204.25 crore, faced a significant drop in its second week. 'Param Sundari's' debut at Rs 7.

title: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs Wife Celeste: Attends Mikayla Nurse‚Äôs 30th birthday celebration in style
content: Leon Draisaitl‚Äôs wife, Celeste Desjardins, joined her close friend Mikayla Nurse, wife of Darnell Nurse, to celebrate Mikayla‚Äôs 30th birthday. The Edmonton Oilers couple, often spotted vacationing and spending off-ice time together. This marked the milestone with heartfelt social media posts, and Celeste shared fun Instagram stories. Mikayla highlighted the event with cheerful captions and stylish photos.

title: India signs pact with Japan for low carbon technologies
content: The Memorandum of Cooperation will facilitate implementation of projects contributing to greenhouse gas reduction or removal and sustainable development in India

title: M.P. BJP worker files complaint after social media users claim he ‚Äòabused‚Äô PM Modi in Bihar
content: The remarks on PM Modi triggered a political storm in poll-bound Bihar as well as in other parts of the country

title: Bihar Cabinet approves Mukhya Mantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
content: As per the scheme, one woman from each family will get ‚Çπ10,000 as grant to start a business; this will give women the opportunity to start businesses of their own choice and will create employment opportunities in the State itself

title: Kozhikode Corpn. struggles to identify land for dog park
content: None of the land under the civic body found suitable; expressions of interest invited from private parties; Opposition councillors stage walkout, insisting the park be built on Corporation‚Äôs plot

title: Facing outcry, L-G announces probe into Vaishno Devi Shrine landslip that left 34 dead on August 26
content: Several civil society bodies, including Jammu High Court Bar Association, demanded a probe into¬†the incident.¬†¬†

title: NHAI allocates ‚Çπ100 crore to repair Kullu-Manali road damaged in flash floods
content: Manali remains cut off after rain, floods and landslides battered NH 21; NHAI is exploring long-term solutions like construction of tunnels and elevated structures

title: Enforcement Directorate seeks fugitive tag for Amira Pure Foods CMD and director
content: The agency tells Delhi court that the two are abroad; proceedings initiated to confiscate assets worth ‚Çπ131 crore

title: Modi wins elections by stealing votes, says Rahul Gandhi
content: Praising the people‚Äôs participation in Voter Adhikar Yatra, Gandhi says the people of Bihar have given a lot of energy to the yatra and slogans against vote theft are echoing across the country

title: Arms and explosives recovered from Maoist dump in Chhattisgarh
content: Over 300 items seized in joint operation in Abujhmad forests; police suspect Maoist hand in Bijapur killing

title: Congress targets Amit Shah, accuses him of spreading ‚Äòlies‚Äô against Rahul Gandhi
content: The Congress attack comes after Mr. Shah, while addressing an event in Guwahati, said the Congress leader should apologise for the ‚Äòabuses‚Äô hurled at Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his late mother during the Yatra in Bihar.

title: Supreme Court seeks clarity from government if Bengali speakers are presumed as ‚Äòforeigners‚Äô
content: The petition filed by an NGO alleged that labourers from West Bengal were detained without due verification, procedural safeguards or compliance with established inter-State coordination protocols

title: Important for India, China to work together to bring stability to world economic order: PM
content: India is ready to advance bilateral relations from a strategic and long-term perspective on the basis of mutual respect, mutual interest and mutual sensitivity, and to enhance strategic communication to address our developmental challenges, says PM Narendra Modi

title: Govt. extends ECHS benefits to medically boarded-out cadets
content: According to Ministry of Defence, the new measure, applicable to cadets medically boarded out before completing training as well as future cases, seeks to ease the humanitarian and financial burden

title: The Hindu Impact: V. Somanna promises review to fast-track Bengaluru Suburban Railway Project
content: His assurance follows The Hindu‚Äôs ‚ÄòSpotlight‚Äô report published on August 29, titled ‚ÄòA dream derailed‚Äô, which highlighted the project‚Äôs setbacks

title: Sasikanth Senthil begins indefinite fast against the Centre for withholding SSA funds from Tamil Nadu
content: The Union government has a moral obligation to release the money first and then discuss the disagreements with the State government. It should not disrupt the education of children, the Tiruvallur¬† Congress MP says¬†

title: Bihar SIR: Eight border districts account for most notices by Election Commission of India
content: Districts sharing borders with Nepal and West Bengal have highest number of voters who did not submit needed documents or whose eligibility and citizenship are under doubt; hearings to begin next week

title: Uber resumes bike taxi services in Karnataka as ‚ÄòBike Direct‚Äô¬†
content: Rapido has recently introduced a feature called Bike Direct to continue its services, describing it as a ‚Äònon-profit initiative‚Äô

title: How Zuckerberg may be behind Trump's ‚Äòtariff threat‚Äô to countries imposing digital taxes
content: Donald Trump is considering tariffs on nations with digital taxes. This follows a meeting with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg. Zuckerberg voiced concerns about these taxes. Trump believes they unfairly target US tech companies. He also thinks they favor Chinese firms. Trump warns of tariffs and semiconductor export restrictions. Meta confirmed the meeting, stating infrastructure investments being discussed.

title: Japan pledges $ 67 billion as India looks to ramp up security, investment ties
content: Amidst global economic uncertainties, PM Modi and Shigeru Ishiba unveiled a comprehensive plan to strengthen India-Japan ties, targeting $67 billion in Japanese private investment over the next decade. The leaders emphasized collaboration in semiconductors, critical minerals, and clean energy, renewing security commitments to ensure a free and open Indo-Pacific region.

title: Railways notifies 150 special trains for festive season rush
content: The special trains will be running from September 21 to November 30, covering the festivals of Durga Puja, Diwali and Chhath Puja

title: Animal Husbandry dept. to launch e-Samrudha digital livestock and e-health management system on August 30
content: E-Samrudha envisions integrating services related to livestock management and veterinary services in the State on a single platform

title: Indian Navy reaffirms commitment to dialogue, trust and cooperative security in Indian Ocean Region
content: The emerging leaders discuss maritime cooperation at IONS panel, emphasising technology, training, and regional security in the Indian Ocean

title: Speaker Om Birla flags decline in standards of debate
content: At SC/ST welfare meet in Bhubaneswar, calls for equity-based nation ensuring rights of Dalits, tribals, marginalised sections

title: News: Red Sox, Mets promote pitching prospects
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the team are scheduled to host the Pittsburgh Pirates at 6:40 p.m. ET . there is also some concern at Coors Field with the Colorado Rockies entertaining the Chicago Cubs .

title: What we're hearing before transfer deadline day: Liverpool to return for Isak?
content: the transfer window is only open across Europe until Monday . sportsmail's reporters are hearing about possible deals if Alexander Isak returns to the first-team . the premier league champions have played the long game with the striker . click here for more transfer news .

title: Gauff meets Simone Biles after US Open win, credits her for inspiring victory
content: Coco Gauff beats Donna Vekic 7-6 (7-5), 6-2 in straight sets at the us open . the pair met after the match, and Gauff thanked her mom so she could say hi . seven-time olympic gold medalist Simone Biles came in the stands .

title: PLL semifinals preview: Stats, matchups, how to watch
content: the 2025 premier lacrosse league playoffs continue this weekend on ESPN . the four teams travel to Subaru Park outside of Philadelphia for the semifinals . sports analyst Quint Kessenich revealed his keys to both matches . he will move ahead of casey Powel with four points .

title: Young Eze's desire to improve led him back to Arsenal
content: eberechi Eze was released from the academy at 13 . the 27-year-old joined arsenal from crystal palace in ¬£67.5m deal . he's achieved what most professional footballers dream of, even if he is rejected by a club .

title: College football hot seats: Brace yourselves for potential blue-blood turnover
content: the college football job market took an expected turn last year . last offseason, there was a dip in head coaching changes at FBS football . the year before, a record 32 jobs turned over, per NCAA statistics .

title: Week 1 preview: Player expectations, freshmen to watch and more
content: all eyes will be on no. 1 Texas - No. 3 Ohio State as the Longhorns travel to the Horseshoe on sunday . quarterback arch Manning and Ohio State wide receiver Jeremiah Smith will play in a tough road matchup to start the season .

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Projecting conference and Finals winners
content: this season, the Oklahoma City Thunder will look to become the first back-to-back champions since 2018 . but there will be plenty of challengers . the new york Knicks have plenty of postseason experience to push even fury .

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: nneka Ogwumike's clutch bucket at the buzzer gives the Storm an 84-82 win over the Mystics . sports experts contend there's no such thing as a consistent clutch player in any sport . who are the biggest clutch shooters in the WNBA, when a game is on the line .

title: Where will your team's next ballpark be? What Royals can teach us about the future of MLB stadiums
content: The K is located in the Truman Sports Complex, next to Arrowhead Stadium . your feelings about that location might depend on how you view the relationship between baseball and the cities in which it is played . in 2021, so long ago that Bobby Witt Jr. had not yet debuted in the majors, Royals owner John Sherman announced a search for a new venue .

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands as final month approaches
content: alden Gonzalez and Jesse Rogers weigh in on who they like most to come out on top of the American League wild-card race . teams are mostly split into three categories: those preparing for the playoffs, those trying to make a run at contention and those whose focus has turned to next season . there's still a fair amount to play for within those groups .
